title: 请问各位大佬怎么给记分板指定分数的人发消息
author: crz0518
txt_content:
/tellraw @a [{"text":"[XXX]：","bold":"true","color":"green"},{"text":"XXXXXX","bold":"true","color":"red"}]
比如我想给某记分板分数1的玩家发送消息要怎么来锁定这个玩家

replies.author: 猜猜谁是谁
replies.txt_content:
猜猜谁是谁 发表于 2017-11-15 16:07
在人物后面加选择器即可
/tellraw @a[score_321_min=1] [{"text":"[XXX]：","bold":"true","color":"green" ...
呸呸呸 后面那个改一下
/tellraw @a[score_321=1,score_321_min=1] [{"text":"[XXX]：","bold":"true","color":"green"},{"text":"XXXXXX","bold":"true","color":"red"}]
给所有在321计分板内的分数=1的人说：“[XXX]：XXXXXX”

replies.author: ⊙v⊙
replies.txt_content: /tellraw @a[score_某个计分板=1,score_某个计分板_min=1] 命令补全...

replies.author: 猜猜谁是谁
replies.txt_content:
在人物后面加选择器即可
/tellraw @a[score_321_min=1] [{"text":"[XXX]：","bold":"true","color":"green"},{"text":"XXXXXX","bold":"true","color":"red"}]给所有在321计分板内的分数=>1的人说：“[XXX]：XXXXXX”
/tellraw @a[score_321=1] [{"text":"[XXX]：","bold":"true","color":"green"},{"text":"XXXXXX","bold":"true","color":"red"}]
给所有在321计分板内的分数=1的人说：“[XXX]：XXXXXX”
举一反三会吧？自己根据需求弄指令即可

replies.author: crz0518
replies.txt_content:
猜猜谁是谁 发表于 2017-11-15 16:11
呸呸呸 后面那个改一下
/tellraw @a[score_321=1,score_321_min=1] [{"text":"[XXX]：","bold":"true","c ...
我这样试过没用所以才来求助的，莫非1.12有什么变化还是我哪里输错了我再试试

replies.txt_content:
crz0518 发表于 2017-11-15 18:16

我这个指令就是在1.12下弄的啊
